author: Willy
content: Phil? I am thinking those are missle hatches.

author: Willy
content: Waiting for the day when they decide to do a live fire against each other “for giggles”. And one of those torpedos goes awry from the scene and takes out a cruise ship or some such thing.

author: Ben Fuller
content: We had a radio controlled mine clearing boat in the Mekong. Towed a grapnel at high speed ( IO drive with a big gas engine). Idea was to grab the control line for a command detonated mine. I don’t know if it actually worked but driving it by hand from a motorcycle seat was a hoot. I can see remotely controlled boats being pretty handy in some other kinds of mine clearance.
